entries.title: Money market data - Norges Bank
entries.text: Norges Bank publishes aggregated money market data based on bank's reporting to Norges Bank (RPD). Data are published approximately at 11 am each working day.

entries.title: Payment statistics - Norges Bank
entries.text: Norge Bank publishes annual statistics on developments in retail payment services. The statistics include the number and value of customer transactions.

entries.text: Norges Bank's API for open data offers programmatic access to selected datasets published by the bank.

entries.title: Monetary policy - Norges Bank
entries.text: We set the policy rate to ensure low and stable inflation in Norway.

entries.text: The Ministry of Finance will conduct a review of the Monetary Policy Regulation, laid down by Royal Decree of 13 December 2019.
